task.title: Determining the version of the DITA Open Toolkit
task.shortdesc: You can determine the version of the DITA-OT from a command prompt.

step.cmd: Open a command prompt or terminal session, and then change to the directory where the DITA Open Toolkit is installed.

info.note: If you have added the absolute path for the install-dir/bin directory to the PATH system variable, you can run the dita command from any location on the file system.
